remarks: Minus 1 times a vector is the negative of the vector.  Equation 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 51.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

lmodvneg1.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvneg1.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvneg1.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.

lmodvneg1 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( M ` .1. ) .x. X ) = ( N ` X ) ) $.
